thread.title: 10 Endradhukkulla

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 10 Endradhukkulla
text:
Cast: Vikram, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Charmme Kaur, Jackie Shroff, Pasupathy
Director: Vijay Milton
Music Director: D Imman
Action: The film is said to be road movie, shot in a unique manner. The crew has shot in some exotic locations including Nepal, just before the devastating earthquake stuck in the country. Interestingly, Charmme will be seen in a song, where she will appear as a character. Jackie Shroff makes a comeback to Tamil after Aranyakaandam.
